src:
NYALANG: Mengharap Derma Semesta
02 Nov 2019, 11:00 by AFP & AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Ada puncak menara menjelang pagi di Frankfurt, hingga festival di India, Nepal dan Inggris dalam foto unik pilihan CNNIndonesia.com pekan ini.


Puncak menara Kronberg di kanan dan menara televisi Frankfurt di atas kabut menjelang terbit matahari di Frankfurt, Jerman. (AP Photo/Michael Probst)



Demonstran anti-pemerintah menyemprotkan pemadam api di tengah bentrok dengan polisi di Santiago, Chile. Presiden Sebastian Pinera mengumumkan pergantian kabinet untuk meredam kerusuhan.  (AP Photo/Rodrigo Abd)



Seorang perempuan Nepal memetik bunga menjelang Festival Tihar di Kathmandu, Nepal. (AP Photo/Niranjan Shrestha)



Umat Hindu mengumpulkan beras yang didistribusikan oleh petugas kuil dalam festival 'Govardhan Pua' di Kuil Madan Mohan, Kolkata, India. Beras ini dipercaya akan membuat hidup lebih baik, dan tidak mengalami kelaparan serta pengorbanan untuk makanan dalam hidup. (Dibyangshu SARKAR / AFP)



Sebuah meteor melintasi langit, terlihat di atas pohon yang terbakar, di Knights Valley, Calif. (Kent Porter/The Press Democrat via AP)



Pemadam kebakaran berjalan di tengah lahan sehabis terbakar di Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Gregory Bull)



Seorang perempuan membonceng anak-anak di Provinsi Nghe An, Vietnam. (NHAC NGUYEN / AFP)



Pendukung Aymaran untuk Presiden Bolivia Evo Morales duduk di depan istana kepresidenan, untuk menjaga keselamatan sang presiden, di La Paz. (AP Photo/Juan Karita)



Seorang peserta pesta kostum berjalan di antara batu nisan di pemakaman gereja St Mary, dalam festival 'Whitby Goth Weekend', di Whitby, sebelah utara Inggris. (Photo by OLI SCARFF / AFP)



Seorang perempuan melewati mural di Manhattan, New York City, Amerika Serikat. (by Johannes EISELE / AFP)
text:
NYALANG: Hoping for Universe
02 Nov 2019, 11:00 by AFP & AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - There is a tower top in the morning in Frankfurt, to festivals in India, Nepal and the UK in CNNIndonesia.com's unique photo selection this week.


The top of the Kronberg tower on the right and the Frankfurt television tower above the fog before sunrise in Frankfurt, Germany. (AP Photo / Michael Probst)



Anti-government demonstrators sprayed firefighters amid clashes with police in Santiago, Chile. President Sebastian Pinera announced the change of cabinet to quell the riots. (AP Photo / Rodrigo Abd)



A Nepali woman picks flowers ahead of the Tihar Festival in Kathmandu, Nepal. (AP Photo / Niranjan Shrestha)



Hindus collect rice distributed by temple officials at the 'Govardhan Pua' festival at Madan Mohan Temple, Kolkata, India. This rice is believed to make life better, and not experience hunger and sacrifice for food in life. (Dibyangshu SARKAR / AFP)



A meteor crosses the sky, seen in a burning tree, in the Knights Valley, Calif. (Kent Porter / The Press Democrat via AP)



The fire department runs in the middle of a burnt field in Los Angeles. (AP Photo / Gregory Bull)



A woman piggybacking children in Nghe An Province, Vietnam. (NHAC NGUYEN / AFP)



Aymaran supporters for Bolivian President Evo Morales sit in front of the presidential palace, to preserve the president's safety, in La Paz. (AP Photo / Juan Karita)



A costume party participant walks between tombstones at the cemetery of St Mary's church, at the 'Whitby Goth Weekend' festival, in Whitby, north of England. (Photo by OLI SCARFF / AFP)



A woman passes by a mural in Manhattan, New York City, United States. (by Johannes EISELE / AFP)
